Zhiwei Li

Guangzhou, China · lzwjava@gmail.com · GitHub · Portfolio

INTRODUCTION

Senior backend / full-stack engineer with 11+ years of professional experience (8 years in corporate roles, 3 years freelancing). Specialize in backend systems, cloud-native services, performance engineering, and practical machine-learning projects. Strong track record building production systems (Java, Spring, Python), mobile apps (iOS / Android), developer automation, and technical writing. Currently working as a backend engineer on banking systems (HSBC) through an outsourcing engagement.
